amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $10,000,000 for experimentation and refinement of tactics and doctrine in the use of the Class IV unmanned aerial vehicles and ground stations associated with such vehicles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4761 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4761 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S8703-8705) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $10,000,000 for experimentation and refinement of tactics and doctrine in the use of the Class IV unmanned aerial vehicles and ground stations associated with such vehicles.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4761 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4761 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
